reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits true to size, with one mentioning it's long enough to cover the abdomen, and they appreciate its soft, fuzzy texture and comfortable, non-itchy feel. The style receives positive feedback, with one customer noting its loose look vibe, and they like its good quality, nice color, and lightweight design. The thickness receives mixed reviews, with some finding it not too thick while others

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Lightweight Sweater for Fall
items.body: I’m absolutely loving the EVALESS Casual Crewneck Sweater for Fall! The lightweight material is perfect for those cooler autumn days without feeling too heavy. The batwing sleeves give it a relaxed, stylish vibe, and the fit is loose but flattering—great for pairing with jeans or leggings. It’s super soft and comfortable to wear all day, whether you’re at home or out and about. The quality is excellent too; after several washes, it hasn’t lost its shape or softness. This sweater has quickly become a staple in my fall wardrobe! Highly recommend if you’re looking for a versatile, cozy sweater for the season! Read more
items.author: Tracy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, flattering and trendy
items.body: I grabbed this sweater in black because I was looking for something casual I could dress up with boots and leggings. It was on sale and said it would arrive the next day. I wasn't sure what I would get but I love it. Super comfy. Great with leggings. Soft material, well made. I just ordered a second in a diff color. For reference, I am 150lbs, 36DD and 5'6. I ordered the large and it is fits loosely w/o looking sloppy. I didn't want it to be form-fitting. It hangs just right. Read more
items.author: Krissy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and has a nice fit.
items.body: Ordered a small in the pink and green. It runs large. I’m a solid medium in amazon clothing but the small fit great. It fits great. Sleeves have nice length. Boat Neckline is nice. Hits right around mid hip. Returned the green since it was itchy on the skin. Seems like the pink one more softer and not itchy even though both are made from same fabric. Only thing I can think of is the pink is solid pink color and the green has a slight white fabric weaved into it. My measurements: Bust 38 bra 32DDD waist 39/30 hips 38 Read more
items.author: Octobersky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Snowflake sweater is perfect!
items.body: It’s beautiful!! Super soft, not itchy. Read more
items.author: Betsy Tirbovich

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Would be a winner with softer fabric
items.body: I wanted to love this sweater because the color was beautiful and my normal size fit me perfectly. I would not categorize this as a crewneck it is definitely more of an boatneck neckline which I really liked. Unfortunately the material is so rough and scratchy I will never wear it so it’s being returned. I ordered the dark green, the shade is not quite as deep as shown and there are white “specks” throughout but it was still very pretty. Read more
items.author: rockmama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars What’s Not To Love About This Sweater?
items.body: I love everything about this sweater. I bought it in the Light Purple color and loved it so much I decided to get it in Black and Pink. The Pink ones are GORGEOUS and look exactly like the photos. The fabric is lightweight, soft and stretchy. The woven design is very eye catching with the diamond pattern. The sizing is very accurate so I recommend ordering your regular size. No need to size up for a loose fit as this sweater is designed to look a little oversized already. I’m 5’ 6” and I weigh 145 lbs. and I got a Medium. It fits me perfectly without looking oversized. I will be ordering a Blue and Pink one next. Love these sweaters! Read more
items.author: Julia L. Gilfoyle

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not at all as pictured!
items.body: Not at all what it looks like. It came totally wrinkled and no matter what I do they won't come out. Even an iron on low did nothing but make me feel I would burn a hole in it! To late to return. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this color and fit
items.body: Gorgeous, soft and exactly as shown! Read more
items.author: jenn

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Dark Green, Red, Fiery Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Purple, Racing Red, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
